./Bodii/Presentation/Components/Charts/B.description: Implemented BodyFatTrendChart with gender-based health zone classification. Uses RectangleMark for zone backgrounds, dynamic line colors based on health zones, and separate male/female zone boundaries following ACE (American Council on Exercise) standards. Health zones: Essential Fat, Athletes, Fitness, Average, Obese with distinct colors. Optional showHealthZones flag allows hiding zones for dashboard views.
